house_listing.house_description: This single family home built in 1974 has 3 bedroom(s), 2 bath(s) , 2 car garage. Rooms include dining room, family room, master bedroom. Features include patio, air conditioning, skylights, storage space.
house_listing.firm_name: RE/MAX On Tatum Realty RE/MAX On Tatum Realty

residential_listing_-_feature_details.rooms: Dining Room, Family Room, Master Bedroom

house_listing.residential_listing_-_additional_feature: Breakfast Room, Cable TV, Ceiling Fan(s), Dishwasher, Garage DoorOpener, Library, Microwave, Pantry, Skylights, Storage Space
